title: Vi ult gets interrupted?
body: Title.  Based on regular League, it seems it should be unstoppable, not so easily knocked out of.

replies.body: Based on regular league it easily get interrupted lol
False, Vi ult is unstoppable unless either the target or she dies during it.

You need to differentiate league from tft...
Any relation between the two is purely coincidental

TFT is not regular league. You have to abandon all your knowledge of regular league mechanics for TFT.

Vi ult is not unstoppable in TFT.

Camille will actually make Vi waste her ability if Camille locks her down anytime before Vi has full mana.
